articles.title: Myanmar anti-coup activists protest against junta with 'silent strike' - Reuters
articles.description: Protesters in Myanmar closed businesses and stayed off the streets on Friday in a "silent strike" against rule by the military and its ousting of the Southeast Asian country's democratically elected government in a February coup.
articles.content: Dec 10 (Reuters) - Protesters in Myanmar closed businesses and stayed off the streets on Friday in a "silent strike" against rule by the military and its ousting of the Southeast Asian country's demo… [+2013 chars]

articles.title: Cynthia Koh lands on Greek TV news for 'milk-your-curves' dress - AsiaOne
articles.description: Local actress Cynthia Koh has appeared on Greek TV news for her controversial 'milk-your-curves’ dress that she recently wore to the Asian Academy Creative Awards. Yesterday (Dec 8), the 47-year-old expressed her joy and shock on a series of Instagram Stories…
